配置集群地址（cluster.crt 在 [yourbiz-cluster.crt](../cluster/yourbiz-cluster.crt)）：

```sh
kubectl config set-cluster yourbiz --server=https://101.133.173.103:6443 --certificate-authority=/path/to/cluster.crt
```

## yourbiz-dev

token:

```text
eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ik1XQWlHeWxYak9SSC1zZWxNWERDWXI5SHpsOGhjMWJNSEd4WjFGakV3dFEifQ..qKgQ5Wt38WBIXX9FPKDeWyX2-ZmPj3tRmHQGXQBxcpGvskEQu0tmFbvuvExG625KWpsnF5SkI25s21MGvKV0v5OVG9fXC3jrDD5vzHKcReohrPceEQwey9Dl8e4eOzt1nCgvIUq8id2MJAWnlCoQTEdnD-PzQFUJnC_nmWiiilFcDcaqYl1bzeuIuobnBUD2shhSUiuVg0hZFEoK-K1qoZMlSPwO7A0EdQZ2cmqozPP8MDK_pPmmsezoskCTA1vcAN53IQl7B7Ocm1E5UtDgkRaAh0XILBb1YXZguK2jGykCJFNbf9uhruGo3B5tC9mLp0mLWBfqOBZx3mzmNoTP-Q
```

配置访问权限：

```sh
kubectl config set-credentials yourbiz-dev-admin --token=$TOKEN
kubectl config set-context yourbiz-dev --cluster=yourbiz --user=yourbiz-dev-admin --namespace yourbiz-dev

# 测试
kubectl config use-context yourbiz-dev
kubectl get pods
```

## yourbiz-prod

token:

```text
eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ik1XQWlHeWxYak9SSC1zZWxNWERDWXI5SHpsOGhjMWJNSEd4WjFGakV3dFEifQ..nw1zltFcwBBxrvB59mXEeVOSCJCjjrsanTr42QlEqFvl7Zgdt6SKXrZEhOBvONgihNBR42LxOx3BYZWKqi6Z3cHhbtewpvjqeKIooeGCqCRFgDxkJw0i0ET77nQoGHhhWIQ4xpdkooggm8PGfcL6DB7nPdGMzswS6n9ZJtJxtMEyc3i5Zen0GrMlafJMiYlN0v0rW5FmPddSi-qLcch4s54xWPlH7TVO9xcOdJLsxb5thPIEyCr6REI7RONUMeSoSX3gh6NWxqPZ3XefLRKgcup363T5Kl37BEUWyeN7JjYRBWOCA6kwiaV5uzXvnq9weMlU_WxyaQW7SdL72dzZpg
```

配置访问权限：

```sh
kubectl config set-credentials yourbiz-prod-admin --token=$TOKEN
kubectl config set-context yourbiz-prod --cluster=yourbiz --user=yourbiz-prod-admin --namespace yourbiz-prod

# 测试
kubectl config use-context yourbiz-prod
kubectl get pods
```
